pacman

Class WeakMonster

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.GameCharacter
      • pacman.Monster
        • pacman.WeakMonster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitor

    public class WeakMonster
extends Monster
    Author:
    Tom Leibovich and Roee Shachar 'Weak Monster' represents the weak monster in the game. The weak monsters move randomly in the game panel and can only defeat the regular pacman.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class pacman.GameCharacter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean move()
      overrides the move method in Game Character but still uses it, meaning if the last move was not accomplished successfully due to an obstacle, than a new random direction is given.
      boolean visit(MightyPacMan mp)
      A method that states that the weak monster doesn't beat the mighty pacman
      boolean visit(RegularPacMan rp)
      A method that states that the weak monster beats the regular pacman
      boolean visit(SuperPacMan sp)
      A method that states that the weak monster doesn't beat the super pacman

      • WeakMonster

        public WeakMonster(GamePanel parent,
           javax.swing.ImageIcon[] icons)
        A constructor for a new weak monster
        Parameters:
        parent - - The game panel
        icons - - The icons for the specific weak monster, for each movement (given by the game panel)

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public boolean move()
        overrides the move method in Game Character but still uses it, meaning if the last move was not accomplished successfully due to an obstacle, than a new random direction is given.
        Overrides:
        move in class GameCharacter
        Returns:
        True - if the move was accomplished successfully, False - otherwise.
